description:
Your task is to sum up the number using the prime number (2,3,5,7...) , and return the last number of the cummulative sum as an answer.

### Input Format
```
The lonely line of input contains an integer S.
```
### Output Format
```
You have to print the last prime P such that sum(prime from 2 to P) = S.
```
### Sample Input 
```
77
```
### Sample Output 
```
19
```
### Explanation
```
2 + 3 + 5 + 7 + 11 + 13 + 17 + "19" = 77 , The answer is 19.
```
### Constraints.
```
0 < P <= 10^12
```
title: Prime Sum
